mapper.sql: id, user_name, mobile, email, user_pwd, role_ids, idcard, realName, peopleType, create_time, last_modify_time, lockTime, islock, failCount
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from tbl_sysmgr_acluser
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sysmgr_acluser (user_name, mobile, email, user_pwd, role_ids, idcard, realName, peopleType, create_time, last_modify_time, lockTime, islock, failCount) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{locktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{islock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failcount,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_sysmgr_acluser au WHERE au.role_ids IN ( SELECT r.id FROM tbl_sysmgr_aclrole r WHERE r.response_user_Id IN ( SELECT u.id FROM tbl_sysmgr_acluser u WHERE u.user_name = #{mobile} ) )
